Uses of Interface
org.hibernate.SessionFactoryObserver

  • Packages that use SessionFactoryObserver 
    Package Description
    org.hibernate.boot
    This package contains the contracts that make up the Hibernate native bootstrapping API (building a SessionFactory).
    org.hibernate.boot.spi  
    org.hibernate.cfg
    This package defines APIs for configuring Hibernate, and classes for building the Hibernate configuration-time metamodel.
    org.hibernate.engine.spi  
    org.hibernate.type.spi  

    • Uses of SessionFactoryObserver in org.hibernate.boot

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SessionFactoryBuilder SessionFactoryBuilder.addSessionFactoryObservers(SessionFactoryObserver... observers)
      Specifies one or more observers to be applied to the SessionFactory.
